alert.note: Alert for Ward; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 5:40PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN WARD AND SOUTHEASTERN WINKLER COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pyote, or 13 miles south of Wink, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Monahans, Wink, Thorntonville, Pyote, Wickett, Roy Hurd Memorial Airport, and Monahans Sandhills State Park. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 61 and 88. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
